titleStmt.title: By the Kings Maiesties surueyor of coales to be shipped at Newcastle vpon Tyne, Sunderland, and Blythe, and other places adjacent, to be brought to the city of London, or otherwise to be spent within the realme of England

notesStmt.note: Line 1 of text ends "more." Names offices in London and Newcastle upon Tyne.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
